mapper.select: SELECT m.material_id, COALESCE(m.omr_notifi_no,m.sorc_no) AS sorc_no, m.serial_no, m.ocm, m.level, m.reception_time, m.agreed_date, mdl.name AS model_name, m.scheduled_expedited, COALESCE(mp.finish_date,m.outline_time) AS finish_time FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON m.material_id = pf.material_id AND pf.position_id = 47 AND pf.operate_result = 0 AND pf.action_time IS NULL LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id = 14 WHERE m.break_back_flg = 0 AND m.material_id NOT IN(SELECT material_id FROM fact_material) ORDER BY pf.operate_result DESC, m.reception_time

SELECT m.material_id, COALESCE(m.omr_notifi_no,m.sorc_no) AS sorc_no, m.serial_no, m.ocm, m.level, m.reception_time, m.agreed_date, mdl.name AS model_name, m.scheduled_expedited, COALESCE(mp.finish_date,m.outline_time) AS finish_time FROM fact_material JOIN af_production_feature ON fact_material.af_pf_key = af_production_feature.af_pf_key JOIN material m ON fact_material.material_id = m.material_id JOIN model mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON m.material_id = pf.material_id AND pf.position_id = 47 AND pf.operate_result = 0 AND pf.action_time IS NULL LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id = 14 WHERE m.break_back_flg = 0 AND af_production_feature.action_time >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY pf.operate_result DESC, m.reception_time
